item.title: And again
item.author: Giovanni Santini
item.description:
And again

heat and cold light and dark life and death

but I still cannot find it is it all a lie?

and again

06-09-2025

Travel: Poetry, Index

item.title: Immense Power
item.author: Giovanni Santini
item.description:
A simple tool with immense power

to do good to make you happy to hurt you it must be used properly

yet why do I struggle to rearrange the alphabet

06-09-2025

Travel: Poetry, Index

item.title: On top of an iceberg
item.author: Giovanni Santini
item.description:
Balancing on top of an iceberg

the ice is melting the fall is cold

can will defeat the inevitable?

09-09-2025

Travel: Poetry, Index
